title: (x) geometric sans/fat face/italic transitional - FF Super Grotesk/Falstaff/Baskerville {Stephen, Rainer, Lari}
content:
Anyone know what these are:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011170202im_/http:/typophile.com/files/444_3418.jpg)

And both the typefaces in this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011170202im_/http:/typophile.com/files/61385805_c58a895d43_4093.jpg)

Thank you!

 [‹ (x) "Summer Shack" bubblegum sans - hand drawn (various alternatives) {Yves, gang}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011170202/http:/typophile.com/node/29780 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) New York Presbyterian Hospital logo - TheSans {Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011170202/http:/typophile.com/node/29817 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Biff

comments.content: The hgb-leipzig-sans-serif above could be [Drescher Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011170202/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/drescher-grotesk-bt/) or [FF Super Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011170202/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FF.11133.0.0).
Neutraface alt would be a good alt to the first one. (And to many more faces, too. :^\>)
The italic one is probably (Monotype?) Baskerville.
